description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Experiment with over 200 guns in this madly interactive game. Each gun has its own unique properties, realistic stats, and sound. Slow down time and watch the bullets as they fly through the air. Supports 1080P HD.
